entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 8. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 2 May 2023
